title: BRIEF-Conduit Capital Says FY Headline Loss Per Share Is Expected Be Between 81 Cents And 95 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Conduit Capital Says FY Headline Loss Per Share Is Expected Be Between 81 Cents And 95 Cents

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 27, 2019 17:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Conduit Capital Says FY Headline Loss Per Share Is Expected Be Between 81 Cents And 95 Cents Sept 27 (Reuters) - Conduit Capital Ltd : * FURTHER TRADING STATEMENT * FY HEADLINE LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED BE BETWEEN 81.0 CENTS AND 95.0 CENTS * FY LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 84.0 CENTS AND 100.0 CENTS * FY NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 98.0 CENTS AND 114.0 CENTS

BRIEF-Conduit Capital Says FY Headline Loss Per Share Is Expected Be Between 81 Cents And 95 Cents
